summary: The Veterans Benefits Administration frequently uses contractors to conduct medical exams that veterans need for disability claims. According to VBA, contractors help it avoid delays in the claims process. VBA awarded exam contracts in 2018 that are worth up to $6.8 billion over 10 years. In October 2018, we recommended that VBA improve its oversight of contracted examiners to ensure they offer high-quality, timely exams...
title: VA Disability Exams: Opportunities Remain to Improve Oversight of Contracted Examiners
